items.title: Takeaways from the millions of newly released files
items.description: Three million new documents include hundreds of mentions of Trump and emails between Epstein and a person called "The Duke".

items.title: Andrew under pressure to give evidence on Epstein
items.description: There are calls for the former prince to testify on what he knew about Jeffrey Epstein's activities - but emails show multiple requests by US authorit...

items.title: Palace sign Strand Larsen in deal worth up to £48m but McNeil loan off
items.description: Crystal Palace sign striker Jorgen Strand Larsen from Wolves in a club-record deal worth up to £48m.

items.title: 'Marry me' and Epstein's 'baby boy' - key Sarah Ferguson revelations in emails
items.description: The latest Epstein files will only add to embarrassment for the former Duchess of York.

items.title: Police assess reports of alleged misconduct after Mandelson emails published
items.description: The peer is accused of passing on sensitive government information to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
